item.title: Trump’s Tax Cuts Will Change How Millions of Americans File in 2026: Are You One of Them?
item.description: The One Big Beautiful Bill Act became law less than six months ago, but several major changes to the tax code have already taken effect.

item.description: Big resolutions fade fast. Here are small, sustainable goals with outsized impact.

item.title: Need to Exchange a Gift? Here’s Every Major Retailer’s Holiday Return Policy
item.description: Retailers like Target and Amazon extend their return policies beyond the typical 30-day window for the holidays, giving you ample time to get a refund...
